AI Description: GLFW is an open-source, multi-platform library for creating windows with OpenGL contexts and managing input. It provides a simple API for creating and managing windows, contexts, and surfaces, receiving input events. GLFW is written in C and provides native support for Windows, macOS, and Linux, as well as experimental support for mobile platforms.
Core Features: Cross-Platform Window Creation & Management, Opengl Context Creation, Input Handling (Keyboard, Mouse, Gamepad), Event Callbacks, Monitor Handling For Fullscreen Windows, File & Drag-&-Drop Support
General Tags: Graphics, Opengl, Cross-Platform, Window Management, Input Handling
